rBody.wit: CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Alb2 Hyd

res.rBody: Domine ne in ira tua arguas me neque in furore tuo corripias me miserere mihi domine quoniam infirmus sum

vBody.wit: CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Alb2 Hyd

verses.vBody:
Timor et tremor venerunt super me et contexerunt me tenebrae
et dixi et dixit et dixit
